Package org.apache.lucene.facet.range

Provides range faceting capabilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DoubleRange Represents a range over double values.
DoubleRangeFacetCounts Facets implementation that computes counts for dynamic double ranges from a provided ValueSource, using FunctionValues.doubleVal(int).
LongRange Represents a range over long values.
LongRangeFacetCounts Facets implementation that computes counts for dynamic long ranges from a provided ValueSource, using FunctionValues.longVal(int).
Range Base class for a single labeled range.
 

Package org.apache.lucene.facet.range Description

Provides range faceting capabilities.
